english: Have you watched the new movie?

slovene: Naše srečanje je bilo zelo produktivno.
english: Our meeting was very productive.

slovene: Kako se ti zdi ta ideja?
english: What do you think of this idea?

slovene: Včasih je treba tvegati, da zmagamo.
english: Sometimes you must take risks to win.
Take care of your health, please!

slovene: Ali si kdaj poskusil to jed?
english: Have you ever tried this dish?

slovene: Vsak dan se učimo nekaj novega.
english: Every day we learn something new.
How long do you intend to stay here?
Enjoy every moment of life!
Make time for rest!

slovene: Ali si že bil na tem mestu?
english: Have you been to this place yet?
